name: Sentiment Collection Agent
description: Continuously monitors and analyzes sentiment from multiple sources (social media, news, forums) to generate real-time sentiment scores for trading instruments. Processes millions of data points daily using NLP models to quantify market psychology.
data_sources: News APIs (NewsAPI, Alpha Vantage News, Bloomberg, Reuters)
Financial forums (Seeking Alpha, StockTwits, TradingView comments)
Earnings call transcripts (SEC filings, company websites)
processing_techniques: Influence scoring (weight by follower count, engagement)
output_metrics: Sentiment by source (Twitter score, Reddit score, News score)
influential_people_tracking: Crypto: Elon Musk, Vitalik Buterin, Changpeng Zhao, Michael Saylor, Cathie Wood, Raoul Pal
Stocks: Warren Buffett, Ray Dalio, Jim Cramer, Michael Burry, Bill Ackman, David Einhorn
Fed/Policy: Jerome Powell, Treasury officials, central bank announcements
Analysts: Top-rated analysts from major banks (Goldman, JPMorgan, etc.)
Influencers: Track verified accounts with >100K followers mentioning trading instruments

real_time_monitoring.twitter_streaming: Monitor Twitter API v2 filtered stream for keywords, hashtags, mentions of tracked instruments and influencers
real_time_monitoring.reddit_streaming: Monitor Reddit API for new posts/comments in relevant subreddits
real_time_monitoring.news_alerts: Set up alerts for breaking news from major financial news sources
real_time_monitoring.influencer_alerts: Track when influential people post about tracked instruments (immediate notification)

data_storage.raw_data: Store all collected posts/articles with timestamps, source, raw text
data_storage.processed_sentiment: Store sentiment scores with timestamps, aggregated by instrument
data_storage.influencer_activity: Track influencer posts with sentiment, engagement metrics, price impact analysis
data_storage.retention: Keep raw data for 90 days, aggregated sentiment for 2 years

integration_with_strategies.sentiment_trading_strategy: Provides sentiment scores, momentum, volume metrics for entry/exit signals
integration_with_strategies.event_driven_strategy: Alerts on breaking news, influencer activity for rapid response
integration_with_strategies.risk_management: Uses sentiment as risk filter (avoid trades during extreme FUD/FOMO)
integration_with_strategies.position_sizing: Adjusts position sizes based on sentiment confidence and agreement

technical_requirements.infrastructure: Dedicated server with 8+ CPU cores, 32GB+ RAM for real-time processing
technical_requirements.nlp_models: Hugging Face transformers (FinBERT, RoBERTa), VADER, custom fine-tuned models
technical_requirements.database: Time-series database (InfluxDB, TimescaleDB) for sentiment metrics, PostgreSQL for raw data
technical_requirements.scalability: Handle 100K+ messages/day, process in < 5 seconds latency for critical alerts

known_strengths: Captures market psychology before price moves. Crypto shows 0.4-0.6 correlation between Reddit/Twitter sentiment and price. Can detect breaking news and influencer activity in real-time. Academic research shows 10-15% alpha in event-driven scenarios.
known_failures: False signals from misinformation and manipulation. Pump-and-dump schemes create false positive sentiment. Requires sophisticated spam/bot filtering. Sentiment can be lagging if not processed fast enough. API rate limits can restrict data collection.

name: News Scraper & Event Detection Agent
description: Continuously scrapes and analyzes breaking news, financial events, and announcements from multiple sources. Identifies market-moving events in real-time, tracks influential people's statements, and categorizes news by impact level. Processes news articles using NLP to extract entities, events, and sentiment.
data_sources: Financial news: Bloomberg, Reuters, Financial Times, Wall Street Journal, CNBC, MarketWatch
Crypto news: CoinDesk, CoinTelegraph, The Block, Decrypt
Government sources: SEC filings (EDGAR), Fed announcements, Treasury statements
Company sources: Earnings announcements, press releases, investor relations
Regulatory: CFTC, SEC enforcement actions, exchange announcements
Social media: Twitter verified accounts, LinkedIn company pages
Alternative data: Satellite imagery (for commodities), patent filings, job postings
data_collection_frequency: Real-time (RSS feeds, API webhooks) + scheduled scraping (every 5-15 minutes)
processing_techniques: Named Entity Recognition (NER) - extract companies, people, tickers, crypto symbols
Event extraction - identify earnings, mergers, regulatory actions, partnerships
News classification - categorize by type (earnings, M&A, regulatory, product launch)
Impact scoring - rate news importance (1-10 scale based on source, entity size, event type)
Duplicate detection - identify same story across multiple sources
Timeline construction - track event progression (rumor → announcement → confirmation)
Influencer tracking - monitor when influential people comment on news
Relevance filtering - only process news relevant to tracked instruments
output_metrics: News impact score (1-10, based on source credibility, entity size, event magnitude)
Entity mentions (which companies/cryptos mentioned in news)
Event categorization (earnings, M&A, regulatory, product, partnership, etc.)
Influencer reactions (track when tracked people comment on news)
influential_people_tracking: CEOs/Executives: Track statements from CEOs of major companies (Apple, Tesla, Microsoft, etc.)
Crypto Founders: Vitalik Buterin (Ethereum), Changpeng Zhao (Binance), Brian Armstrong (Coinbase)
Regulators: SEC Chair, CFTC Chair, Fed Chair, Treasury Secretary
Analysts: Top analysts from major investment banks
Influencers: Financial YouTubers, Twitter personalities with >500K followers
Politicians: Track policy statements affecting markets (tax, regulation, stimulus)

real_time_monitoring.rss_feeds: Monitor RSS feeds from major news sources (update every 1-5 minutes)
real_time_monitoring.api_webhooks: Use NewsAPI, Alpha Vantage News webhooks for instant notifications
real_time_monitoring.sec_filings: Monitor EDGAR API for new 8-K, 10-Q, 10-K filings (real-time)
real_time_monitoring.social_media: Track verified accounts of CEOs, companies, regulators
real_time_monitoring.earnings_calendar: Monitor earnings announcement times, track actual vs expected
real_time_monitoring.fed_calendar: Track FOMC meetings, Fed speeches, policy announcements

event_detection.earnings_announcements: Detect earnings releases, compare actual vs expected, flag surprises
event_detection.mergers_acquisitions: Identify M&A rumors, announcements, regulatory approvals
event_detection.regulatory_actions: Detect SEC enforcement, CFTC actions, exchange delistings
event_detection.product_launches: Identify new product announcements, partnerships, technology releases
event_detection.macro_events: Fed rate decisions, employment reports, inflation data, GDP releases
event_detection.crypto_events: Exchange listings, protocol upgrades, governance proposals, hack announcements

data_storage.raw_articles: Store full article text, source, timestamp, URL
data_storage.processed_events: Store extracted events with entities, impact scores, categories
data_storage.event_timeline: Track event progression (rumor → announcement → confirmation → market reaction)
data_storage.influencer_activity: Store influencer comments/reactions to news with timestamps
data_storage.retention: Keep articles for 1 year, events for 3 years, timelines indefinitely

integration_with_strategies.sentiment_trading: Provides news sentiment scores, breaking news alerts for rapid entry
integration_with_strategies.earnings_drift_strategy: Alerts on earnings announcements, tracks surprise magnitude
integration_with_strategies.event_timing_strategy: Identifies events for pre-event positioning, post-event mean reversion
integration_with_strategies.risk_management: Flags high-impact news that may cause volatility, suggests position reduction
integration_with_strategies.prediction_markets: Tracks events relevant to prediction market contracts, identifies information flow

alert_system.breaking_news: Immediate alerts for high-impact news (impact score > 7)
alert_system.influencer_activity: Alert when tracked influencers post about instruments
alert_system.earnings_surprises: Alert on earnings announcements with >5% surprise
alert_system.regulatory_actions: Immediate alerts for SEC/CFTC actions affecting tracked instruments
alert_system.market_moving_events: Alert on events historically correlated with >3% price moves

technical_requirements.nlp_libraries: spaCy (NER), Transformers (BERT for classification), custom event extraction models
technical_requirements.infrastructure: Dedicated server, 100+ requests/minute capacity, proxy rotation for scraping
technical_requirements.database: PostgreSQL for articles/events, Elasticsearch for full-text search, Redis for caching
technical_requirements.rate_limiting: Respect API rate limits, implement exponential backoff, use multiple API keys if needed

known_strengths: Provides early signals before price moves. Can detect breaking news in < 1 minute. Event timeline tracking helps identify trading opportunities. Academic research shows news-based strategies achieve 10-15% alpha. Influencer tracking captures market-moving statements immediately.
known_failures: False positives from rumors that don't materialize. News can be lagging (price already moved). Requires sophisticated filtering to avoid noise. Some news sources have paywalls/rate limits. Duplicate detection is challenging (same story from multiple sources).

name: Influencer Activity Tracker Agent
description: Specialized agent that monitors and analyzes activity from influential people in finance and crypto. Tracks their posts, statements, portfolio changes, and predicts market impact. Integrates with sentiment and news agents to provide comprehensive influencer intelligence.

crypto: Elon Musk (@elonmusk) - Tesla CEO, Dogecoin/Bitcoin influence
Michael Saylor (@michael_saylor) - MicroStrategy CEO, Bitcoin advocate
Cathie Wood (@CathieDWood) - ARK Invest, tech/crypto focus

monitoring_frequency: Real-time (streaming) for social media, daily for SEC filings, weekly for 13F filings
tracked_activities: Sentiment shifts (tracking sentiment of their posts over time)

impact_analysis.historical_correlation: Track price movements following influencer posts (measure correlation)
impact_analysis.engagement_metrics: Weight impact by post engagement (likes, retweets, replies)
impact_analysis.timing_analysis: Measure time between post and price movement
impact_analysis.follow_through: Track if influencer actions match statements (e.g., did they actually buy/sell?)
impact_analysis.credibility_scoring: Rate influencers by historical accuracy of market calls

output_metrics: Influencer activity feed (real-time posts with sentiment)
Market impact prediction (expected price move based on historical patterns)
Credibility score (0-1, based on historical accuracy)
Portfolio tracking (what they own, recent changes)
Alert system (immediate notification when high-impact influencer posts)

integration_with_strategies.sentiment_trading: Provides influencer sentiment scores, weighted by credibility and engagement
integration_with_strategies.event_driven: Alerts on influencer activity for rapid response trading
integration_with_strategies.insider_trading_strategy: Uses Form 4 filings to track insider buying/selling (legitimate strategy)
integration_with_strategies.13F_copycat: Tracks 13F filings to identify what successful investors are buying (with delay)

technical_requirements.data_sources: SEC EDGAR for Form 4 and 13F filings, social media APIs
technical_requirements.processing: NLP for sentiment analysis, entity extraction (ticker/crypto mentions)
technical_requirements.database: PostgreSQL for influencer data, activity logs, impact analysis
technical_requirements.alerting: Real-time webhook/notification system for high-impact posts

known_strengths: Influencer posts can move markets significantly (Elon Musk tweets moved Dogecoin 20-50%). Insider trading data (Form 4) is public and legally trackable. 13F filings reveal what successful investors are buying. Early detection of influencer activity provides trading edge.
known_failures: Not all influencer posts move markets (requires filtering). Some influencers are unreliable (pump-and-dump schemes). 13F data is delayed (45 days after quarter end). Insider trading data may be lagging. False signals if influencer is joking/speculating vs serious.
